# OCP Provider

Terraform provider for managing OCP infrastructure via its GraphQL API.

## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    ocp = {
      source  = "davidhrbac/ocp"
      version = "~> 0.1"
    }
  }
}

provider "ocp" {
  endpoint             = "https://ocpportal.int.tieto.com/v2/graphql/"
  token                = var.ocp_token
  insecure_skip_verify = false
}
```

## Authentication

The provider requires an API token. Provide it with the `token` argument or set
the `OCP_TOKEN` environment variable.

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `endpoint` (String) Base URL of the OCP GraphQL API.
- `insecure_skip_verify` (Boolean) Insecure skip verify.
- `token` (String, Sensitive) Authentication token for the OCP GraphQL API.
